Title: Chigurida Kanasu
Writer: Dr. Kota Shivaram Karanth (original story), Jayanth Kaikini (screenplay), T.S. Nagabharana (screenplay), Jayanth Kaikini (dialogue)
Actors: Shivarajkumar, Vidhya Venkatesh, Rekha Unnikrishnan, Anant Nag
Plot: Shankar, a city lad, pays a visit to his ancestral village. When he decides to settle there for good, he faces opposition from his own family and from a village bigwig.
